application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: PROPOSED TELECOMMUNICATIONS INSTALLATION: PROPOSED ERECTION OF 15.0M PHASE 9 SLIMLINE MONOPOLE, X3 GROUND BASED CABINETS AND ASSOCIATED ANCILLARY WORKS.
site_name: Telecom Monopole Opposite Rhodes Moorhouse Court
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Notwithstanding the agreed detail, the monopole and associated cabinets shall be externally finished in dark green colour RAL6009 or similar.

Reason:  To ensure a satisfactory appearance of the development and to comply with policy CS14 of Merton's Core Planning Strategy 2011 and policies DMD2, DMD6 of Merton's Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 2 - The applicant is reminded that the adjacent trees, located in the Upper Morden Conservation Area are protected as set out in the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 Part VIII. This prohibits cutting down, topping, lopping, uprooting and damage and destruction to the tree without written consent from the LPA.
